meanings.definition: Gadroonings (noun): decorative raised ornamentation on metalwork or ceramics
meanings.sent1: The gadroonings on the vase added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully crafted the gadroonings on the silver platter.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the vase, scattering the gadroonings everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like intricate gadroonings, bringing beauty to everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the gadroonings, creating a dazzling display.

meanings.definition: Gadroonings (verb): the act of adding decorative raised ornamentation to an object
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed gadroonings the edges of the picture frame with delicate patterns.
meanings.sent2: The artisan spent hours gadroonings the wooden chest with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully pretended to gadroonings their toys with imaginary decorations.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to gadroonings the air with a sense of magic and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully gadroonings the cake with swirls of frosting, making it a work of art.
